item.title: If (playerlevel PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I got this code now:

case 2620: // Crate to expert shop. if(Player.combatLevel > 89) { teleportToX = 3217; teleportToY = 3418; sendMessage("Welcome to the expert shop!"); } else { sendMessage("You need a combat level of 90 or higher to enter!"); } break;
BUT ERROR

[code]:: Preparing for compile…
:: Auto-setting envriomental variables…
::
:: Scanning for latest JDK version…
::
:: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
:: Results:
client.java:3581: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable combatLevel
location: class Player
if(Player.combatLevel > 89) {
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
:: Thank You for Compiling!
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

[/code]

Read full topic

if (combatLevel > 89) {
teleportToX = 3217;
teleportToY = 3418;
sendMessage(“Welcome at the expert shop”);
} else {
sendMessage("You need a combat or higher to

enter!");
}
break;[/code]

i know that if (playerlevel[0-24] <-- are skills but what is combat?
